about_the_game:
The Game


Burkov is a competative shooter set in fictional place on the border between Finland and Russia. In a lawless world contractors work to secure classified intel from secret facilites and closed off areas. Unexplained fenometies such as gravitational shifts and twice as long nights as days has caused several countries to shutdown and leave areas abandoned. This has opened up the oppertunity for lawless individuals to seek riches by forming factions and fight to cease control over areas.

Your Mission


Your mission is to choose a faction and work your way up the organization by doing contracts with a POC, also known as Point of Contact. By choosing certain POC's you gain reputation and special rewards. Other individuals, even people within your organization are pursuing the same goals as you, so be aware when securing intel.

Risk and Reward


When pursuing intel you can choose wether you want to risk bringing valuble items into the raid. The more value you bring into the raid, the better rewards you get when meeting up with your POC. Leaving a raid empty-handed will decrease your reputation and the rewards will be minimal. Leaving a raid full with items and equipment, will grant you highly valuables such as gear, money and reputation. Be aware, if you die during the raid you will loose everything you staked.

Net Worth


Money is not just a number. Increasing your wealth will not only grant you access to more expensive gear, it will also increase your ranks within the organization. Being famous has it's downsides though. You will put yourself in a more vunerable position if your choose to climb high. Entering a raid as an Elite rank will put you in cornered situations, as more people are willing to kill you in order to claim your wealth. Bearing an Elite badge will also give you less options to escape with your intel.

content_descriptors.notes: Weapons, death, killing and money are present in the game and are considered mature.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: ntel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: X11 Compatible GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 or higher with 4GB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
